goAgain(Scanner) - Static method in class cscd211Methods.Lab3Methods
The goAgain method prompts the user to play again the method ensures the user enters yes or no (any case) This method also ensures the carriage return is stripped from the input buffer

NOTE: A precondition that is not possible to enforce here is the input buffer is empty when the method is called.
